with recursive BoardTree as ( select board_no, board_title, pre_board, board_writer, anon_id, board_date, hit_cnt, 1 as board_level, cast(board_no as char(50)) as board_path, board_enabled, board_date as root_date from board where pre_board is null and board_ctg = 1
and board_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and board_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and board_writer like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
union all
select b.board_no, b.board_title, b.pre_board, b.board_writer, b.anon_id, b.board_date, b.hit_cnt, bt.board_level + 1, concat(bt.board_path, '-', b.board_no) as board_path, b.board_enabled, bt.root_date from board b join BoardTree bt on b.pre_board = bt.board_no where board_ctg = 1 ) select board_no, board_title, pre_board, board_writer, anon_id, board_date, hit_cnt, board_level, board_path, board_enabled, root_date from BoardTree order by root_date desc, board_path, board_level limit #{pager.startRowIndex}, #{pager.rowsPerPage}
